SELECT ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_ID, ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE( ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE SET ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_NAME = :ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_ID = :ACCIDENT_IMPORTANCE_ID
